checkout.invalidComponentQuantityReduceQuantityEr: The number of pieces of the desired configuration was automatically adjusted, because the containing components are not available in sufficient quantity.
checkout.invalidComponentQuantityRemoveConfigurat: The requested configuration has been removed from the shopping cart because the components it contains are not available in sufficient quantity.
checkout.invalidConfiguratorQuantityReduceQuantit: The number of pieces of the desired configuration was automatically adjusted, because the containing components are not available in sufficient quantity.
checkout.InvalidConfiguratorQuantityRemoveConfigu: The requested configuration has been removed from the shopping cart because the components it contains are not available in sufficient quantity.
checkout.invalidSelectionError: The requested configuration is invalid and has been removed.
